title: Alphabet Letter - Z - Color Red - 2 Inch Block Style - Embroidered Iron on Patch
features: High quality, detailed embroidery applique can be sewn or ironed onto polyester or cotton. Wash cold, dry on no-heat.
Easy DIY craft project for kids or beginners. Great for sweaters, beanies, hats, bags, jeans, jackets, clothing, masks, and more!
Upcycle and be environmentally friendly! Patch up a hole or cover a stain and repurpose your wardrobe.
Non-traditional uses: Make a keychain, a Christmas ornament, a decorative magnet, a pin for your jacket or hat, make wearable jewelry, or a greeting card!
description: Iron on patches are a great way to show off your creative and individual personality. This patch comes ready to iron on, or you can sew this on with a sewing machine or sew a few tack stitches for a permanent application. If you want to add these to your shoes or a lamp shade, we recommend E6000 craft glue or simply use your hot glue gun. Embroidered patches are so versatile, you can personalize and decorate almost anything!
